attributes.action: Agree 2-4 yr olds funding is a payment for services not funding for staff costs.
attributes.additional_details: It is penalising the early years businesses/charities.  The DfE is ignoring that we have other costs and they are not privy to our financials or business setups.  We have contracts with our local authorities to provide a service and the DfE cannot decide suddenly that the funding is purely for salary.
attributes.background: Change the DfE guidance to acknowledge funding is a payment for services and therefore we are entitled to claim retention scheme like any other business

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/317072
